title: Start0
body:
Hey.
<<set $positive to 0>>
[[What is it?|1a]]
[[What?|1b]]

title: 1a
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
What are you playing?

[[Some...thing.|2a]]
[["Don't Let Them Slip Through."|2b]]

title: 1b
body:
<<set $positive -= 1>>
What are you playing?

[[Some...thing.|2a]]
[["Don't Let Them Slip Through."|2b]]

title: 2a
body:
<<set $positive -= 1>>
...Alright. What's it about?

[[Just watch me play and find out?|3a]]
[[I'm this circle thing and I dodge the triangles while trying to save the little guys.|3b]]

title: 2b
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
Never heard of it...What's it about?

[[Just watch me play and find out?|3a]]
[[I'm this circle thing and I dodge the triangles while trying to save the little guys.|3b]]

title: Start1
body:
So...what have you been up to lately?

[[You know, the same old. What about you?|4a]]
[[Not much.|4b]]

title: 3a
body:
<<set $positive -= 1>>
Okay...

title: 3b
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
Sounds cool.

title: 4a
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
Oh, me? Same old too, I guess?

[[Alright.|6a]]
[[Yeah?|6b]]

title: 4b
body:
<<set $positive -= 1>>
Oh, okay. You sure like that game though, huh?

[[Not really.|5a]]
[[Hell yeah.|5a]]

title: 6a
body: <<set $positive -= 1>>

title: 6b
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
Yeah. It's been kind of hard though.

[[What's up?|7a]]
[[Same.|6a]]

title: 7a
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
I'm just tired all the time I guess.

[[Same.|6a]]
[[What's wrong?|7b]]

title: 7b
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
It's nothing, really. Like I said, just tired.

[[Okay.|6a]]
[[Well, try to take care of yourself.|8a]]

title: 8a
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
Thanks.

title: Start2
body:
Well, I'm gonna head home now.

[[Okay.|9a]]
[[This soon?|9b]]

title: 9a
body:
<<set $positive -= 1>>
Yep, see ya.

[[Bye.|10a]]
[[Yeah, catch you later.|10b]]

title: 10a
body: <<set $positive -= 1>>

title: 10b
body: <<set $positive += 1>>

title: 9b
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
Yeah. Sorry, I just got shit to do.

[[That blows.|11a]]
[[Same.|11b]]

title: 11a
body:
<<set $positive += 1>>
It's cool. Anyways, see ya.

[[Bye.|10a]]
[[Yeah, catch you later.|10b]]

title: 11b
body:
<<set $positive -= 1>>
Bye.

[[Yeah, bye.|10a]]
[[Yeah, catch you later.|10b]]

title: End
body:
<<if $positive > 8>>
[You hung out with your friend the next day.]
<<else>>
[Your friend didn't come over the next day.]
<<endif>>
